summary: Adds a new female follower in the sleeping giant.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#999999][url=http://www.ld-host.de/][img]http://www.ld-host.de/uploads/images/caf986404c69bc68fcd673ac22e34bfb.jpg[/img][/url]
[size=5]LANGUAGE:[/size][/color][size=5] [/size][b][size=5][font=Georgia][color=#999999]English[/color][/font][/size][/b]
[b][size=5]
[/size][/b][b][color=#b6b6b6][size=3]NEWEST VERSION: 1.0
[/size][/color][/b][color=#666666]
_________________________________________________________________________[/color]


[u][b][color=#999999][font=Arial][size=5]1. DISCRIPTION[/size][/font][/color][/b][/u]
[size=3]
[/size]Good news Dragonborn, 

Diara a pure fighter-girl with additional health and stamina awaits you in "the sleeping giant"
....the tavern in Riverwood, for those who are new to the game... 

She levels with the player and fights with onehanded weapons and a shield.
She can heal herself a little bit and can also cast "flames" but because of her
bonuses with health and stamina, she got less magicka than normal and therefore
isn 't capable to do much with her not well trained magic-skills.

She is marriable.[color=#999999]
[/color][color=#666666]
________________________________________________________________________[/color]
[size=5][u][b][color=#999999]
2. NO DLC NEEDED/[/color] ES WIRD KEIN DLC BENÖTIGT[/b][/u][/size]
[color=#6d9eeb][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color]


[size=5][b][u][color=#999999]3.YOU NEED TO HAVE THE FOLLOWING MODS [/color]/ BENÖTIGTE MODS[/u][/b][/size]

[size=4][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/?][color=#6d9eeb]Calientes body replacer by [/color][b][color=#6d9eeb]Caliente[/color]
[/b][/url][/size]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Rene[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]wal by [b]Hello Santa[/b][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?][b][/b][/url][/size][/center][center]_________________________________________________________________________
[size=5][u][b][color=#999999]4. ADDITIONAL MODS i AM USING AND ARE USED FOR SCREENSHOTS /
[/color]MODS, DIE ICH FÜR SCREENSHOTS BENUTZTHABE
[/b][/u][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15551/?]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15551/?]zoners high performance enb[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15551/?] by [b]Shrutesh[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence by [b]CaBaL- EmeraldReign-the AMB team
[/b][/url]
[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color]


[u][b][size=5][color=#999999]5. KNOWN BUGS / [/color]BEKANNTE PROBLEME[/size][/b][/u]

[color=#999999]none so far / bisher keine

[/color][color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color]


[size=5][b][u][color=#999999]6. FINDING DIARA  [/color]/ WO DU DIARA FINDEST[/u][/b][/size]

[color=#999999]You can find Diara in "The Sleeping Giant Inn".

[/color]Du findest Sie im "Zum Schlafenden Riesen".

[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color]

[u][color=#999999][size=5][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65157/?][img]http://www.ld-host.de/uploads/images/c6c3a9c5d605d6061c3665268d6cc086.gif[/img][/url]
[/b][/size][/color][/u][u][color=#999999][size=5][b]7. DISCLAIMER[/b][/size][/color][/u]

[color=#999999]This follower was created by me, if there is a doubt, please have a look 
at my steam-account there is the total of all my mods. This mod does no questrelevant changes, 
so it can 't influence or damage your game at this point, as far as I know. 
Still, there is always danger using a mod, so i take no responsibility if it crashes your game, 
but this mod is cleaned with TESVedit so there is just the minimal thread like always when using a mod. 

[/color][u][b][size=5]7. KLARSTELLUNG[/size]
[/b][/u]
Der in dieser Mod enthaltene Follower wurde von mit erstellt,
sollten Zweifel daran bestehen 
bitte auf folgendem Steamprofil nachschauen. Dort kann man alle meine Mods ebenfalls 
runterladen. Abgesehen davon übernehme ich keine Verantwortung, wenn euer Spiel 
aus was für Gründen auch immer abstürzen sollte, oder unspielbar werden sollte. 
Diese Mod ist mit TESVEdit von "dirty edits" gereinigt worden uns sollte keine größeren
Probleme verursachen. Es ist immer ein Risiko eine Mod zu verwenden, 
aber ich habe versucht dieses klein zu halten.

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197993479673/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850][color=#6d9eeb]My profile on steam
[/color][/url]
[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________
_________________________________________________________________________[/color]

[color=#999999][size=5][u][b]8. A SUGGESTION[/b][/u][/size][/color]

[color=#999999]Just a suggestion at the end of the discription: For less CDT-Issues in general 
while playing the game, you should use LOOT for the right loadorder and TESVEdit aswell to get 
rid fo so called "dirty edits". It 's not that difficult as it seems and I was able to 
minimise crashes on my computer to nearly zero! Have a look a "GOPHERS" tutorials on 
youtube to get to know how to handle these programms!

[/color][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SzoyWugzZAw]Gophers loot tutorial[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fw3g_N1jcZQ]Gophers TESVEdit tutorial
[/url]
[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________
_________________________________________________________________________[/color]
